description:
Kuroto tries to get Senshiro to quit being a Zweilt, to stay away from fighting Cadenza. But when Yuki leaves the grounds to seek out Luka, he finds himself in Cadenza’s trap. Kuroto and Senshiro must fight the Duras responsible for all their grief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsumi to Batsu to Yakusoku to
